entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:03 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 1:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 6.1°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
